_header: What heileth a man why is he proud [Wat heylet man qui is he prud]
_description: On the Vanity of Mortal Life, in John Grimestone’s preaching notebook — six couplets

NLS18721.First Lines:
Wat heylet man qui is he prudWat ned hat he of riche
                    scrud…
NLS18721.Last Lines:
…Þus solen we turnen child an manIn puder of herde an be
                    no man
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 60.
